member.name: T:JetBrains.IntegrationTestsServer.IntegrationTestsServerModeCommandLineSwitch
member.summary: Enables the integration tests server mode when specified.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IntegrationTestsServer.Server.IntegrationTestsServerService.InvokeTestMethodBody(JetBrains.Lifetimes.Lifetime,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object[],System.Object,JetBrains.Platform.Test.Integration.FrameworkCommon.Server.TestRunFlags)
member.summary: Invokes the test method body, sync or async, main thread or free-threaded. Awaits it if async, and extracts the value.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IntegrationTestsServer.Server.ServerObjectCache.GetOrCreateInstance(System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Instantiates requested type or gets an instance from the cache. Sites the instance, if it is an ITestWithSite.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IntegrationTestsServer.Server.Shell.UiaContext.GetYieldToUia(JetBrains.Lifetimes.Lifetime)
member.summary: Use the await construct on this value to switch your async execution flow to the UIA thread.
